zeus.agents
Interface ZeusExternal

All Known Implementing Classes:
ACC, pingExternal
public interface ZeusExternal

This class provides a means to connect an agent to an application specific external interface, (it is typically used to connect GUI front-ends to the agent, but they do not need to be graphical in nature). External interfaces are launched when the agent is started and may persist for the life-time of the agent.

Instructions and an example of how to implement and link an external interface to an agent are provided in Section 6 of the Zeus Application Realisation Guide.
